Google::Protobuf

Class Description
Google::Protobuf::Any +Any+ contains an arbitrary serialized protocol buffer message along with a URL that describes the type of the serialized message.
Google::Protobuf::BoolValue Wrapper message for +bool+.
Google::Protobuf::BytesValue Wrapper message for +bytes+.
Google::Protobuf::DoubleValue Wrapper message for +double+.
Google::Protobuf::Empty A generic empty message that you can re-use to avoid defining duplicated empty messages in your APIs.
Google::Protobuf::FloatValue Wrapper message for +float+.
Google::Protobuf::Int32Value Wrapper message for +int32+.
Google::Protobuf::Int64Value Wrapper message for +int64+.
Google::Protobuf::StringValue Wrapper message for +string+.
Google::Protobuf::Timestamp A Timestamp represents a point in time independent of any time zone or calendar, represented as seconds and fractions of seconds at nanosecond resolution in UTC Epoch time.
Google::Protobuf::UInt32Value Wrapper message for +uint32+.
Google::Protobuf::UInt64Value Wrapper message for +uint64+.

Google::Rpc

Class Description
Google::Rpc::Status The +Status+ type defines a logical error model that is suitable for different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs.
